00020 #ifndef AGG_ELLIPSE_INCLUDED
00021 #define AGG_ELLIPSE_INCLUDED
00022 
00023 #include "agg_basics.h"
00024 #include <math.h>
00025 
00026 namespace agg
00027 {
00028 
00029     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030     class ellipse
00031     {
00032     public:
00033         ellipse() : m_x(0.0), m_y(0.0), m_rx(1.0), m_ry(1.0), m_num(4), m_step(0) {}
00034 
00035         void init(double x, double y, double rx, double ry, unsigned num_steps);
00036         void reset_iterator(unsigned idx);
00037         pathflag_e next_vertex(double* x, double* y);
00038 
00039     private:
00040         double m_x;
00041         double m_y;
00042         double m_rx;
00043         double m_ry;
00044         unsigned m_num;
00045         unsigned m_step;
00046     };
00047 
00048 
00049     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     inline void ellipse::init(double x, double y, double rx, double ry, unsigned num_steps)
00051     {
00052         m_x = x;
00053         m_y = y;
00054         m_rx = rx;
00055         m_ry = ry;
00056         m_num = num_steps;
00057         m_step = 0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061     inline void ellipse::reset_iterator(unsigned)
00062     {
00063         m_step = 0;
00064     }
00065 
00066     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067     inline pathflag_e ellipse::next_vertex(double* x, double* y)
00068     {
00069         if(m_step >= m_num) return pathflag_stop;
00070         double angle = double(m_step) / double(m_num) * 2.0 * pi;
00071         *x = m_x + cos(angle) * m_rx;
00072         *y = m_y + sin(angle) * m_ry;
00073         m_step++;
00074         return (m_step == 1) ? pathflag_move_to : pathflag_line_to;
00075     }
00076 
00077 }
